title: NTT DATA and Carlisle & Gallagher Consulting Group Earn IDC Financial Insights FinTech Rankings
text:
[October 13, 2015] NTT DATA and Carlisle & Gallagher Consulting Group Earn IDC Financial Insights FinTech Rankings 
NTT DATA, Inc. , a leading IT services provider, and Carlisle & Gallagher Consulting Group, Inc. (CG), an NTT ( News - Alert ) DATA company, today announced the placement of NTT DATA Corporation in the Enterprise Top 25 and CG in the Top 100 2015 IDC Financial Insights FinTech Rankings . NTT DATA Corporation was ranked No. 10 among the Top 25 Enterprise Companies in FinTech, and CG was No. 73 on the Top 100 list. 
"Inclusion in the Enterprise Top 25 is a testament to the quality of flexible, innovative solutions that help our clients increase profitability and compete globally," said Jim Milde, president of financial services and insurance, NTT DATA, Inc. "The FinTech Rankings reinforce our commitment to the financial services industry as we continuously provide clients with the applications and services required to embrace digital business and sustain industry leadership." 
For more than a decade, IDC ( News - Alert ) Financial Insights has evaluated global technology providers of hardware, software and IT services. To determne the FinTech Rankings, the organization tracks revenues stemming from the financial services industry, as well as companies whose revenues from financial services represent a significant component of spending by financial institutions. The FinTech Rankings Top 100 include vendors that derive more than one-third of their revenue from financial institutions. The FinTech Enterprise Top 25 include enterprise companies serving multiple industries that derive less than one-third of their revenues from financial institutions. 
"CG's ranking in the FinTech Top 100 recognizes our ongoing commitment to provide superior consulting services to the financial services industry in North America," said Steve Chapman, president, Carlisle & Gallagher Consulting Group, Inc. "As an NTT DATA company, the collective experience, expertise, investments in R&D and global reach gives financial services organizations the advantage they need to solve their most critical business and technology challenges in today's market." 
About NTT DATA 
NTT DATA is a leading IT services provider and global innovation partner with 75,000 professionals based in over 40 countries. NTT DATA emphasizes long-term commitment and combines global reach and local intimacy to provide premier professional services, including consulting, application services, business process and IT outsourcing, and cloud-based solutions. We're part of NTT Group, one of the world's largest technology services companies, generating more than $100 billion in annual revenues, and partner to 80% of the Fortune Global 100. 
Visit www.nttdata.com/americas to learn how our consultants, projects, managed services, and outsourcing engagements deliver value for a range of businesses and government agencies. 
About Carlisle & Gallagher Consulting Group, Inc. 
Carlisle & Gallagher Consulting Group, Inc. (CG, www.carlisleandgallagher.com ) is the business and technology consulting firm that 7 of the 10 largest financial institutions in North America count on to help them solve their greatest challenges. We've earned the trust and ongoing partnership of these industry leaders because of our exclusive focus on the financial services industry, the unparalleled experience of our people, the exceptional customer experience we provide and the definitive, repeatable results we consistently deliver. As an NTT DATA company, CG brings the added benefits of broad technology depth, cross-industry innovation and global reach from NTT DATA's position as a leading IT services provider and global innovation partner with 75,000 professionals based in over 40 countries. 
About IDC 
International Data Corporation (IDC) is the premier global provider of market intelligence, advisory services, and events for the information technology, telecommunications, and consumer technology markets. With more than 1,100 analysts worldwide, IDC offers global, regional, and local expertise on technology and industry opportunities and trends in over 110 countries. IDC's analysis and insight helps IT professionals, business executives, and the investment community to make fact-based technology decisions and to achieve their key business objectives. Founded in 1964, IDC is a subsidiary of IDG, the world's leading technology media, research, and events company. To learn more about IDC, please visit www.idc.com .
